page.title: 16PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: There are two means of public transport in our D block.A bus company by the name of Thomas Brothers have their main depot in Llangadog and operate a public bus service in the area with a bus travelling through the same route about ten times a day.This company also hires coaches for tour throughout the country and even abroad.Their coaches are painted in green and cream colours.There are two request stop railway stations in our D block being the ones at Llangadog and Llanwrda.The railway runs from Llanelli to Shrewsbury and is called the central Wales line and is in danger of closure.Trains run in both directions four times during the day.
